(I WIN!  AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!  Ok, my power has been out for over 57 hours.  It 
isn't the first time, and it won't be the last.  Also had to do some major 
clean up at home.  Throw away a lot of stuff from the fridge and freezers.  
Clean up the kitchen.  Stuff like that.  Then had to wrestle control of the 
phone line from my brother and father.

Ok, so anyway, I checked all the e-mails yesterday at my dad's work, but I 
can't access those anymore.  So, I'm going to have to try and remember what 
happened.  Sorry if I don't reply to everything, I'm trying to remember what 
it all is.

Also, about the Cybertronian Fire, and the area that surrounds it.

THERE ARE NO TREES NEAR THE CF!  NONE!  NOTTA!

Also, there is no where to hide!  It's all flat grasslands, and the grass 
isn't even a foot high!  So please, please, pay attention ta that.  

Thank you.  I will be replying shortly soon.  I've got a lot of other online 
responsobilities right now.  Other RPGs and crap.  Also, I've gotta get all 
my character profiles (Thanks Zardus, enjoy your last night of living before 
Chyort rips your throat out and rips you limb from limb :) .  So, I'll try 
and get back to ya'll as soon as possible.  But I noticed a lot of people 
didn't respond to the attack I made before my power went out.  I'll ignore 
that since I held up the game a little.  )

L. Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
